plot: After a visitation by the ghost of a childhood friend, a disturbed man comes to believe he can achieve eternal youth by killing adolescent boys.
title: Hamlin Pond
plot_es: After a visitation by the ghost of a childhood friend, a disturbed man comes to believe he can achieve eternal youth by killing adolescent boys.
plot_en: After a visitation by the ghost of a childhood friend, a disturbed man comes to believe he can achieve eternal youth by killing adolescent boys.
